name: Montgomery Thomas
story: Montgomery Thomas, born and raised in London, joined the British Army at the age of 18. He quickly rose through the ranks and is now serving as an Assistant Gunner for the HMG/GMG team in his battalion. Montgomery is known for his outgoing personality and his ability to keep morale high among his fellow soldiers, even in the most trying of circumstances. He is proud to serve his country and will do whatever it takes to protect his comrades.
